text: The Blue Notebook () is a 1963 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Kulidzhanov.Чуркин в детстве играл в фильмах про историю и врачей «Скорой помощи»СИНЯЯ ТЕТРАДЬ It stars Mikhail Kuznetsov, Mark Nikelberg, and Nikolay Lebedev. == Actors == * Mikhail Kuznetsov as V.I. Lenin * Mark Nikelberg as Zinovyev * Nikolay Lebedev as Nikolay Aleksandrovich Emelyanov * Aleksandr Paleev as Sverdlov * Vasiliy Livanov as Dzherzhinsky * Boris Tokarev as Kondratiy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1963 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kulidzhanov
title: The Blue Notebook
